summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, from the north line of Rainier View Addition to Thistle Street, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2786 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
